scripts.clean: pnpm -r run clean || true && rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.env:check:stg: doppler run --project crive --config stg -- node scripts/validate-env.mjs apps/api apps/admin
scripts.env:check:prd: doppler run --project crive --config prd -- node scripts/validate-env.mjs apps/api apps/admin
scripts.deps:sbom: pnpm dlx @cyclonedx/cdxgen -o reports/sbom.json || pnpm dlx cyclonedx-bom -o reports/sbom.json || node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('reports/sbom.json',JSON.stringify({generatedAt:new Date().toISOString(),deps:[]},null,2))"
